taxon.title: Immune Support & Infection Resistance
taxon.description: Strengthen your body's natural defenses during seasonal changes and times of increased exposure. Support daily resilience and overall wellness with time-tested botanicals and modern nutritional support.

taxon.description: Build lasting immune resilience with gentle, daily support for year-round wellness and vitality.

taxon.description: Build lasting immune resilience with gentle, daily support for year-round wellness and vitality.

taxon.description: Boost your immune response during cold and flu season with fast-acting botanicals to reduce symptoms and support recovery.

taxon.description: Gentle, kid-friendly formulations to support developing immune systems and reduce sick days.
